hh3cStorageSnap.name: hh3cStorageSnap
hh3cStorageSnap.contactinfo: Platform Team H3C Technologies Co., Ltd. Hai-Dian District Beijing P.R. China Http://www.h3c.com Zip:100085
hh3cStorageSnap.description: This MIB describes the general information about snap of storage device.

hh3cAddtionalSpaceMaxSize.name: hh3cAddtionalSpaceMaxSize
hh3cAddtionalSpaceMaxSize.description: This object identifies the maximal size of snapshot resource, safecache, and Continued replication Resource .

hh3cSnapConfigTable.name: hh3cSnapConfigTable
hh3cSnapConfigTable.description: This table contains some entity to config the snapshot resources for special logic volumes.

hh3cSnapConfigEntry.name: hh3cSnapConfigEntry
hh3cSnapConfigEntry.description: An entry containing configuration about the snapshot resource.

hh3cSnapLvIndex.name: hh3cSnapLvIndex
hh3cSnapLvIndex.description: This object identifies the index of hh3cSnapConfigTable. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of hh3cLvIndex.

hh3cSnapAreaId.name: hh3cSnapAreaId
hh3cSnapAreaId.description: This object identifies the snapshot resource of the logic volume.

hh3cSnapAreaAutoExpand.name: hh3cSnapAreaAutoExpand
hh3cSnapAreaAutoExpand.description: This object describes if the space of snapshot resource can be expanded automatically.

hh3cSnapAreaThreshold.name: hh3cSnapAreaThreshold
hh3cSnapAreaThreshold.description: If hh3cSnapAreaAutoExpand is selected, the 'hh3cSnapAreaThreshold' means the threshold of the snapshot resource.

hh3cSnapAreaIncSize.name: hh3cSnapAreaIncSize
hh3cSnapAreaIncSize.description: If hh3cSnapAreaAutoExpand is selected, the 'hh3cSnapAreaIncSize' means the amount of space to be allocated for each expansion.

hh3cSnapAreaMaxSize.name: hh3cSnapAreaMaxSize
hh3cSnapAreaMaxSize.description: If hh3cSnapAreaAutoExpand is selected, the 'hh3cSnapAreaIncSize' means the max size of snapshot resource.

hh3cSnapAreaFullDeleteTM.name: hh3cSnapAreaFullDeleteTM
hh3cSnapAreaFullDeleteTM.description: This object identifies if the snapshot resource is out of space and expand failed, if the system delete the old timemark until enough space or not.

hh3cSnapAreaNotify.name: hh3cSnapAreaNotify
hh3cSnapAreaNotify.description: This object describes if a snapshot notification should be send to the client when the system create a timemark.

hh3cSnapAreaStatus.name: hh3cSnapAreaStatus
hh3cSnapAreaStatus.description: This object describes the state of the snapshot resource.

hh3cSnapRaidUuid.name: hh3cSnapRaidUuid
hh3cSnapRaidUuid.description: This object describes the raid where the snapshot resource is created.

hh3cSnapRaidSize.name: hh3cSnapRaidSize
hh3cSnapRaidSize.description: This object describes the size designated when the snapshot resource is created.

hh3cSnapRaidSelectPolicy.name: hh3cSnapRaidSelectPolicy
hh3cSnapRaidSelectPolicy.description: This object describes the policy when the snapshot resource is created automatically. Note that the value can not be 'none' when the value of associated hh3cSnapRaidUuid object is equal to null.

hh3cSnapAreaTotalSize.name: hh3cSnapAreaTotalSize
hh3cSnapAreaTotalSize.description: This object identifies the current total size of the snapshot resource.

hh3cSnapAreaFreeSize.name: hh3cSnapAreaFreeSize
hh3cSnapAreaFreeSize.description: This object identifies the free size of the snapshot resource.

hh3cSnapExtendTimes.name: hh3cSnapExtendTimes
hh3cSnapExtendTimes.description: This object identifies the times the snapshot resource extended.

hh3cSnapRowStatus.name: hh3cSnapRowStatus
hh3cSnapRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action of snapshot resource. Note that the assocai snapshot resource can not be delete when a snapshot copy is processing or the TimeMark is enabled, or the replication is enabled.

hh3cSnapExpandTable.name: hh3cSnapExpandTable
hh3cSnapExpandTable.description: This table contains some entity to expand a snapshot resource.

hh3cSnapExpandEntry.name: hh3cSnapExpandEntry
hh3cSnapExpandEntry.description: An entry containing expand information applicable to the snapshot resource.

hh3cSAExpRaidUuid.name: hh3cSAExpRaidUuid
hh3cSAExpRaidUuid.description: This index is identical to hh3cRaidUuid in HH3C-RAID-MIB.

hh3cSAExpSize.name: hh3cSAExpSize
hh3cSAExpSize.description: This object describes the increased size for snapshot resource when expanded. The units is million bytes. The value is always equal to zero when read.

hh3cSAExpRaidSize.name: hh3cSAExpRaidSize
hh3cSAExpRaidSize.description: This object describes the size for snapshot resource on the raid. The units is million bytes. The value is always equal to zero when read.

hh3cSnapAreaExpRowStatus.name: hh3cSnapAreaExpRowStatus
hh3cSnapAreaExpRowStatus.description: This object describes the actions to expand the size for snap.

hh3cSnapCopyTable.name: hh3cSnapCopyTable
hh3cSnapCopyTable.description: This table contains some entity about snapshot copy.

hh3cSnapCopyEntry.name: hh3cSnapCopyEntry
hh3cSnapCopyEntry.description: An entry containing snapshot copy information applicable.

hh3cSnapCopyLvIndex.name: hh3cSnapCopyLvIndex
hh3cSnapCopyLvIndex.description: This object identifies the index of destination logic volume for snapshot copy.

hh3cSnapCopyPercentage.name: hh3cSnapCopyPercentage
hh3cSnapCopyPercentage.description: This object identifies the percentage of snapshot copy. The value is equal to zero if the snapshot copy has not started. When finished, the value is always equal to '100'.

hh3cSnapCopyStartTime.name: hh3cSnapCopyStartTime
hh3cSnapCopyStartTime.description: This object identifies the time to start the snapshot copy.

hh3cSnapCopySwitch.name: hh3cSnapCopySwitch
hh3cSnapCopySwitch.description: This object describes the actions to start or stop the snapshot copy. When read, the value of 'none' will be get. Note that if the snapshot resource of source logic volume has not been created, the action of snapshot copy will be refused by agent.

hh3cTimeMarkConfigTable.name: hh3cTimeMarkConfigTable
hh3cTimeMarkConfigTable.description: This table contains some entity to config a TimeMark on a special logic volume.

hh3cTimeMarkConfigEntry.name: hh3cTimeMarkConfigEntry
hh3cTimeMarkConfigEntry.description: An entry containing config information applicable to the TimeMark.

hh3cTimeMarkCounts.name: hh3cTimeMarkCounts
hh3cTimeMarkCounts.description: This object identifies the max num of TimeMark which can be configed.

hh3cTimeMarkInitializeTime.name: hh3cTimeMarkInitializeTime
hh3cTimeMarkInitializeTime.description: This object identifies the date and time when the first TimeMark is created on the logic volume.

hh3cTimeMarkInterval.name: hh3cTimeMarkInterval
hh3cTimeMarkInterval.description: This object identifies the interval when the TimeMark is created automatically if the value of this object is not equal to zero. The units is second. the min value is 10 seconds.

hh3cTimeMarkLastTime.name: hh3cTimeMarkLastTime
hh3cTimeMarkLastTime.description: This object identifies the date and time when the latest TimeMark is created on the logic volume.

hh3cTimeMarkTotal.name: hh3cTimeMarkTotal
hh3cTimeMarkTotal.description: This object identifies the current num of TimeMark.

hh3cTimeMarkSwitch.name: hh3cTimeMarkSwitch
hh3cTimeMarkSwitch.description: This object describes enable or disable TimeMark.

hh3cTimeMarkCreateTable.name: hh3cTimeMarkCreateTable
hh3cTimeMarkCreateTable.description: This table contains some entity to create a TimeMark on a special logic volume.

hh3cTimeMarkCreateEntry.name: hh3cTimeMarkCreateEntry
hh3cTimeMarkCreateEntry.description: An entry containing create information applicable to the TimeMark.

hh3cTimeMarkStamp.name: hh3cTimeMarkStamp
hh3cTimeMarkStamp.description: This object identifies the date and time the TimeMark is created.

hh3cTimeMarkComment.name: hh3cTimeMarkComment
hh3cTimeMarkComment.description: This object identifies the comment of the TimeMark.

hh3cTimeMarkSize.name: hh3cTimeMarkSize
hh3cTimeMarkSize.description: This object identifies the current size of the TimeMark.

hh3cTimeMarkRowStatus.name: hh3cTimeMarkRowStatus
hh3cTimeMarkRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create or delete the TimeMark. Note that the TimeMark can not be deleted if it is using.

hh3cTimeMarkCopyTable.name: hh3cTimeMarkCopyTable
hh3cTimeMarkCopyTable.description: This table contains some entity about a TimeMark copy.

hh3cTimeMarkCopyEntry.name: hh3cTimeMarkCopyEntry
hh3cTimeMarkCopyEntry.description: An entry containing config information applicable to the TimeMark copy.

hh3cTMCopyDestLvId.name: hh3cTMCopyDestLvId
hh3cTMCopyDestLvId.description: This object identifies the index of destination logic volume for TimeMark copy.

hh3cTMCopyPercentage.name: hh3cTMCopyPercentage
hh3cTMCopyPercentage.description: This object identifies the percentage of TimeMark copy. The value is equal to zero if the TimeMark copy has not started. When finished, the value is always equal to '100'.

hh3cTMCopyStartTime.name: hh3cTMCopyStartTime
hh3cTMCopyStartTime.description: This object identifies the time to start the TimeMark copy.

hh3cTMCopySwitch.name: hh3cTMCopySwitch
hh3cTMCopySwitch.description: This object describes the actions to start or stop the TimeMark copy. When read, the value of 'none' will be get.

hh3cTimeMarkRollbackTable.name: hh3cTimeMarkRollbackTable
hh3cTimeMarkRollbackTable.description: This table contains some entity to use a TimeMark to rollback the logic volume.

hh3cTimeMarkRollbackEntry.name: hh3cTimeMarkRollbackEntry
hh3cTimeMarkRollbackEntry.description: An entry containing config information applicable to use a TimeMark to rollback the logic volume.

hh3cTMRollbackPercentage.name: hh3cTMRollbackPercentage
hh3cTMRollbackPercentage.description: This object identifies the percentage of rollback.

hh3cTMRollbackStartTime.name: hh3cTMRollbackStartTime
hh3cTMRollbackStartTime.description: This object identifies the time to start the rollback.

hh3cTMRollbackSwitch.name: hh3cTMRollbackSwitch
hh3cTMRollbackSwitch.description: This object describes the actions to use a TimeMark to rollback the logic volume. Note that once you roll back, you cannot roll forward, all the later TimeMark behind it will be deleted.

hh3cTimeViewTable.name: hh3cTimeViewTable
hh3cTimeViewTable.description: This table contains some entity to config a TimeView on a special TimeMark.

hh3cTimeViewEntry.name: hh3cTimeViewEntry
hh3cTimeViewEntry.description: An entry containing config information applicable to the TimeView.

hh3cTimeViewStamp.name: hh3cTimeViewStamp
hh3cTimeViewStamp.description: This object identifies the TimeView. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of hh3cTimeMarkStamp.

hh3cTimeViewName.name: hh3cTimeViewName
hh3cTimeViewName.description: This object identifies the name of the TimeView.

hh3cTimeViewRowStatus.name: hh3cTimeViewRowStatus
hh3cTimeViewRowStatus.description: This object describes the actions to create or delete the TimeView.

hh3cReplicaConfigTable.name: hh3cReplicaConfigTable
hh3cReplicaConfigTable.description: This table contains some entity to config replication for a logic volume.

hh3cReplicaConfigEntry.name: hh3cReplicaConfigEntry
hh3cReplicaConfigEntry.description: An entry containing config information applicable to the replication for a logic volume.

hh3cRepLocalLvIndex.name: hh3cRepLocalLvIndex
hh3cRepLocalLvIndex.description: This object identifies the local logic volume that is related with replication. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of hh3cSnapLvIndex.

hh3cLvRepLocalWay.name: hh3cLvRepLocalWay
hh3cLvRepLocalWay.description: The value of 'outgoing' means the hh3cRepLocalLvIndex is the primary logic volume of replication, and the hh3cRepRemoteLvIndex is the replica logic volume. The value of 'incoming' means the hh3cRepLocalLvIndex is the replica logic volume of replication. , and the hh3cRepRemoteLvIndex is the primary logic volume.

hh3cRepLocalServerIP.name: hh3cRepLocalServerIP
hh3cRepLocalServerIP.description: This object identifies the ip address of local server.

hh3cRepLocalServerIPType.name: hh3cRepLocalServerIPType
hh3cRepLocalServerIPType.description: This object identifies the ip address type of local server.

hh3cRepLocalServerName.name: hh3cRepLocalServerName
hh3cRepLocalServerName.description: This object identifies the name of local server.

hh3cRepLocalServerUsername.name: hh3cRepLocalServerUsername
hh3cRepLocalServerUsername.description: This object identifies the username of local server.

hh3cRepLocalServerPassword.name: hh3cRepLocalServerPassword
hh3cRepLocalServerPassword.description: This object identifies the password of local server.

hh3cRepRemoteServerIP.name: hh3cRepRemoteServerIP
hh3cRepRemoteServerIP.description: This object identifies the ip address of remote server.

hh3cRepRemoteServerIPType.name: hh3cRepRemoteServerIPType
hh3cRepRemoteServerIPType.description: This object identifies the ip address type of remote server.

hh3cRepRemoteServerName.name: hh3cRepRemoteServerName
hh3cRepRemoteServerName.description: This object identifies the name of remote server.

hh3cRepRemoteServerUsername.name: hh3cRepRemoteServerUsername
hh3cRepRemoteServerUsername.description: This object identifies the username of remote server.

hh3cRepRemoteServerPassword.name: hh3cRepRemoteServerPassword
hh3cRepRemoteServerPassword.description: This object identifies the password of remote server.

hh3cRepRemoteLvIndex.name: hh3cRepRemoteLvIndex
hh3cRepRemoteLvIndex.description: This object identifies the logic volume of remote server.

hh3cReplicaMode.name: hh3cReplicaMode
hh3cReplicaMode.description: This object identifies the replication mode: The value of 'adaptive' means that data from the primary resource is continuously replicated to a replica resource unless the system determines it is not practical or possible. The value of 'remote' means that a snapshot is taken of the primary resource at prescribed intervals based on the criteria you set (schedule and/or watermark value). Note that the associated Continuous Replication Resource can not be created if the value of this boject is not equal to 'adaptive'.

hh3cReplicaWatermark.name: hh3cReplicaWatermark
hh3cReplicaWatermark.description: This object identifies the size of watermark which means a replication is scheduled.

hh3cReplicaWatermarkRetry.name: hh3cReplicaWatermarkRetry
hh3cReplicaWatermarkRetry.description: If the 'hh3cReplicaWatermark' is set, This object identifies the interval time to retry if the last replication is failed. The units is minute.

hh3cReplicaInitializeTime.name: hh3cReplicaInitializeTime
hh3cReplicaInitializeTime.description: This object identifies the time to start an initial replication.

hh3cReplicaInterval.name: hh3cReplicaInterval
hh3cReplicaInterval.description: This object identifies how often the replication should be repeated after initial replication. The units is minute.

hh3cReplicaEncrypt.name: hh3cReplicaEncrypt
hh3cReplicaEncrypt.description: This object identifies the encrypt option is enable or diable.

hh3cReplicaCompress.name: hh3cReplicaCompress
hh3cReplicaCompress.description: This object identifies the compress option is enable or diable.

hh3cReplicaUseExistTM.name: hh3cReplicaUseExistTM
hh3cReplicaUseExistTM.description: This object identifies if using the exist TimeMark to replicate or not.

hh3cReplicaProtocol.name: hh3cReplicaProtocol
hh3cReplicaProtocol.description: This object identifies the protocol about replication. The value 'tcp' means Transmission Control Protocol, and 'rudp' means Reliable User Datagram Protocol.

hh3cReplicaScanDiff.name: hh3cReplicaScanDiff
hh3cReplicaScanDiff.description: This object identifies the system to scan both the primary and replica resource to determine how much data needs to be synchronized.

hh3cReplicaStatSwitch.name: hh3cReplicaStatSwitch
hh3cReplicaStatSwitch.description: This object identifies the action how to operate the replica. When read , a value of 'none' will be get. The value of 'promte' means remove the replication relation and promote the remote copy on the target server. The value of 'sync' means synchronize mannually (force a replication that is not scheduled.) The value of 'scan' means scan the delta data between primary resource and replica resource. The value of 'reversal' means switch the roles of the primary resource and replica resource. The replication configuration is maintained. The primary and replica must be synchronized in order to reverse a replica. The value of 'stop' means stop a replication that is currently in progress. The value of 'suspend' means suspend future replications from automatically being triggered by replication policies (watermark, interval, time). This will not stop a replication that is currently in progress. The value of 'resume' means resume the replication status from suspended to normal. Note that if the action of 'upgrade' is executed successfully, this replica resource will become a normal logic volume, and this entry will be deleted automatically. Note that if the action of 'reversal' is executed successfully, Clients will be disconnected from the former primary resource.

hh3cReplicaRowStatus.name: hh3cReplicaRowStatus
hh3cReplicaRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to enable or disable the replication.

hh3cReplicaStateTable.name: hh3cReplicaStateTable
hh3cReplicaStateTable.description: This table contains some entity to show replication state.

hh3cReplicaStateEntry.name: hh3cReplicaStateEntry
hh3cReplicaStateEntry.description: An entry containing show information applicable to the replication state.

hh3cReplicaDelta.name: hh3cReplicaDelta
hh3cReplicaDelta.description: This object identifies the size of delta data after last sync.

hh3cReplicaLastSyncTime.name: hh3cReplicaLastSyncTime
hh3cReplicaLastSyncTime.description: This object identifies the date and time when last sync is taken.

hh3cReplicaNextSyncTime.name: hh3cReplicaNextSyncTime
hh3cReplicaNextSyncTime.description: This object identifies the date and time when next sync will be taken.

hh3cReplicaSyncTotalSize.name: hh3cReplicaSyncTotalSize
hh3cReplicaSyncTotalSize.description: This object identifies how much data need to be synchronized to the replica resource for current replication.

hh3cReplicaSyncCurPercentage.name: hh3cReplicaSyncCurPercentage
hh3cReplicaSyncCurPercentage.description: This object identifies how much data has been synchronized to the replica resource for current replication.

hh3cReplicaSyncPerformance.name: hh3cReplicaSyncPerformance
hh3cReplicaSyncPerformance.description: This object identifies the performance of the synchronize. The unit is MB/s.

hh3cReplicaRunStatus.name: hh3cReplicaRunStatus
hh3cReplicaRunStatus.description: This object identifies the state of the replica.

hh3cCDRConfigTable.name: hh3cCDRConfigTable
hh3cCDRConfigTable.description: This table contains some entity to config Continuous Replication Resource.

hh3cCDRConfigEntry.name: hh3cCDRConfigEntry
hh3cCDRConfigEntry.description: An entry containing some information applicable to Continuous Replication Resource of the logic volume.

hh3cCDRLvIndex.name: hh3cCDRLvIndex
hh3cCDRLvIndex.description: This object identifies the source logic volume of the Continuous Replication Resource. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of hh3cRepLocalLvIndex. Note that an entry of hh3cCDRConfigTable can be created only when the associated hh3cCDRDistributeTable's objects is ready or the associated select policy is not equal to 'none'. If an entry is deleted, the associated hh3cCDRDistributeTable objects should be deleted automatically.

hh3cCDRID.name: hh3cCDRID
hh3cCDRID.description: This object identifies the Continuous Replication Resource.

hh3cCDRStatus.name: hh3cCDRStatus
hh3cCDRStatus.description: This object identifies the state of the Continuous Replication Resource.

hh3cCDRTotalSize.name: hh3cCDRTotalSize
hh3cCDRTotalSize.description: This object identifies the total size of the Continuous Replication Resource.

hh3cCDRFreeSize.name: hh3cCDRFreeSize
hh3cCDRFreeSize.description: This object identifies the free size of the Continuous Replication Resource.

hh3cCDRSelectPolicy.name: hh3cCDRSelectPolicy
hh3cCDRSelectPolicy.description: This object describes the policy about allocating the space for Continuous Replication Resource.

hh3cCDRRowStatus.name: hh3cCDRRowStatus
hh3cCDRRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create or delete the Continuous Replication Resource.

hh3cCDRDistributeTable.name: hh3cCDRDistributeTable
hh3cCDRDistributeTable.description: This table contains some entity to config the distribution of Continuous Replication Resource.

hh3cCDRDistributeEntry.name: hh3cCDRDistributeEntry
hh3cCDRDistributeEntry.description: An entry containing some information applicable to the distribution of Continuous Replication Resource.

hh3cCDRDistLvIndex.name: hh3cCDRDistLvIndex
hh3cCDRDistLvIndex.description: This index is identical to hh3cLvIndex in HH3C-LOGIC-VOLUME-MIB.

hh3cCDRRaidUuid.name: hh3cCDRRaidUuid
hh3cCDRRaidUuid.description: This index is identical to hh3cRaidUuid in HH3C-RAID-MIB.

hh3cCDRRaidSize.name: hh3cCDRRaidSize
hh3cCDRRaidSize.description: This object identifies the size on the special raid distributed for the Continuous Replication Resource.

hh3cCDRExtRowStatus.name: hh3cCDRExtRowStatus
hh3cCDRExtRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create the distribution for the Continuous Replication Resource.

hh3cSafeCacheConfigTable.name: hh3cSafeCacheConfigTable
hh3cSafeCacheConfigTable.description: This table contains some entity to config SafeCache.

hh3cSafeCacheConfigEntry.name: hh3cSafeCacheConfigEntry
hh3cSafeCacheConfigEntry.description: An entry containing some information applicable to SafeCache of the logic volume.

hh3cSafeCacheLvIndex.name: hh3cSafeCacheLvIndex
hh3cSafeCacheLvIndex.description: This object identifies the source logic volume of the SafeCache. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of hh3cLvindex. Note that an entry of hh3cSafeCacheConfigTable can be created only when the associated hh3cSafeCacheDistributeTable's objects is ready or the associated select policy is not equal to 'none'. If an entry is deleted, the associated hh3cSafeCacheDistributeTable objects should be deleted automatically.

hh3cSafeCacheStatus.name: hh3cSafeCacheStatus
hh3cSafeCacheStatus.description: This object identifies the state of the SafeCache.

hh3cSafeCacheTotalSize.name: hh3cSafeCacheTotalSize
hh3cSafeCacheTotalSize.description: This object identifies the total size of the SafeCache. The units is million bytes.

hh3cSafeCacheFreeSize.name: hh3cSafeCacheFreeSize
hh3cSafeCacheFreeSize.description: This object identifies the free size of the SafeCache. The units is million bytes.

hh3cSafeCacheSelectPolicy.name: hh3cSafeCacheSelectPolicy
hh3cSafeCacheSelectPolicy.description: This object describes the policy about allocating the space for SafeCache.

hh3cSafeCacheThreshold.name: hh3cSafeCacheThreshold
hh3cSafeCacheThreshold.description: This object identifies the maximal percentage of date changed before data flushing.

hh3cSafeCacheFlushTime.name: hh3cSafeCacheFlushTime
hh3cSafeCacheFlushTime.description: This object identifies the period during which the date can stay in cache before data flushing. The units is second.

hh3cSafeCacheFlushCommand.name: hh3cSafeCacheFlushCommand
hh3cSafeCacheFlushCommand.description: This object identifies the number of commands when data flushing.

hh3cSafeCacheSkipDupWrite.name: hh3cSafeCacheSkipDupWrite
hh3cSafeCacheSkipDupWrite.description: This object identifies skip duplicate write commands or not.

hh3cSafeCacheRunStatus.name: hh3cSafeCacheRunStatus
hh3cSafeCacheRunStatus.description: This object identifies the run state of the SafeCache.

hh3cSafeCacheSwitch.name: hh3cSafeCacheSwitch
hh3cSafeCacheSwitch.description: This object identifies the action of the SafeCache. The value 'suspend' means suspend the SafeCache. The value 'resume' means resume the SafeCache.

hh3cSafeCacheRowStatus.name: hh3cSafeCacheRowStatus
hh3cSafeCacheRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create or delete the SafeCache.

hh3cSafeCacheDistributeTable.name: hh3cSafeCacheDistributeTable
hh3cSafeCacheDistributeTable.description: This table contains some entity to config the SafeCache resource.

hh3cSafeCacheDistributeEntry.name: hh3cSafeCacheDistributeEntry
hh3cSafeCacheDistributeEntry.description: An entry containing some information applicable to SafeCache resource of the logic volume.

hh3cSafeCacheDistLvIndex.name: hh3cSafeCacheDistLvIndex
hh3cSafeCacheDistLvIndex.description: This index is identical to hh3cLvIndex in HH3C-LOGIC-VOLUME-MIB.

hh3cSafeCacheRaidUuid.name: hh3cSafeCacheRaidUuid
hh3cSafeCacheRaidUuid.description: This index is identical to hh3cRaidUuid in HH3C-RAID-MIB.

hh3cSafeCacheRaidSize.name: hh3cSafeCacheRaidSize
hh3cSafeCacheRaidSize.description: This object identifies the size on the special raid distributed for the SafeCache resource.

hh3cSafeCacheExtRowStatus.name: hh3cSafeCacheExtRowStatus
hh3cSafeCacheExtRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create the distribution for the SafeCache resource.

hh3cMirrorConfigTable.name: hh3cMirrorConfigTable
hh3cMirrorConfigTable.description: This table contains some entity to config mirror.

hh3cMirrorConfigEntry.name: hh3cMirrorConfigEntry
hh3cMirrorConfigEntry.description: An entry containing some information applicable to mirror for the logic volume.

hh3cMirrorLvIndex.name: hh3cMirrorLvIndex
hh3cMirrorLvIndex.description: This object identifies the source logic volume of the mirror. The object identified by this index is the same object as identified by the same value of hh3cLvindex. Note that an entry of hh3cMirrorConfigTable can be created only when the associated hh3cMirrorDistributeTable's objects is ready or the associated select policy is not equal to 'none'. If an entry is deleted, the associated hh3cMirrorDistributeTable objects should be deleted automatically.

hh3cMirrorType.name: hh3cMirrorType
hh3cMirrorType.description: This object identifies the type of the mirror.

hh3cMirrorStatus.name: hh3cMirrorStatus
hh3cMirrorStatus.description: This object identifies the state of the mirror resource.

hh3cMirrorName.name: hh3cMirrorName
hh3cMirrorName.description: This object identifies the name of the mirror resource. it is used when promote mirror resource.

hh3cMirrorSyncPercentage.name: hh3cMirrorSyncPercentage
hh3cMirrorSyncPercentage.description: This object identifies the percentage of the mirror sync.

hh3cMirrorSyncPerformance.name: hh3cMirrorSyncPerformance
hh3cMirrorSyncPerformance.description: This object identifies the performance of the mirror sync. The unit is MB/S

hh3cMirrorDelta.name: hh3cMirrorDelta
hh3cMirrorDelta.description: This object identifies size of delta data after the last mirror sync.

hh3cMirrorRaidType.name: hh3cMirrorRaidType
hh3cMirrorRaidType.description: This object identifies the raid type of the mirror resource.

hh3cMirrorSelectPolicy.name: hh3cMirrorSelectPolicy
hh3cMirrorSelectPolicy.description: This object describes the policy about allocating the space for mirror resource.

hh3cMirrorSwitch.name: hh3cMirrorSwitch
hh3cMirrorSwitch.description: This object identifies the state of the mirror. The value of 'sync' means synchronize mannually. The value of 'swap' means switch the roles of the primary resource and mirror resource. The value of 'promte' means break the mirrored pair and convert the mirror resource into an independent logic volume. The new logic volume will have all of the properties of a regular logic volume. Note that if the action of 'promte' is executed successfully, this mirror resource will become a primary logic volume, and this entry will be deleted automatically.

hh3cMirrorExtendRaidUuid.name: hh3cMirrorExtendRaidUuid
hh3cMirrorExtendRaidUuid.description: This object identifies the raid of the mirror resource when the primary logic volume resource is extended.

hh3cMirrorRowStatus.name: hh3cMirrorRowStatus
hh3cMirrorRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create or delete the mirror resource.

hh3cMirrorDistributeTable.name: hh3cMirrorDistributeTable
hh3cMirrorDistributeTable.description: This table contains some entity to config the mirror resource.

hh3cMirrorDistributeEntry.name: hh3cMirrorDistributeEntry
hh3cMirrorDistributeEntry.description: An entry containing some information applicable to mirror resource for the logic volume.

hh3cMirrorDistLvIndex.name: hh3cMirrorDistLvIndex
hh3cMirrorDistLvIndex.description: This index is identical to hh3cLvIndex in HH3C-LOGIC-VOLUME-MIB.

hh3cMirrorRaidUuid.name: hh3cMirrorRaidUuid
hh3cMirrorRaidUuid.description: This index is identical to hh3cRaidUuid in HH3C-RAID-MIB.

hh3cMirrorRaidSize.name: hh3cMirrorRaidSize
hh3cMirrorRaidSize.description: This object identifies the size on the special raid distributed for the mirror resource.

hh3cMirrorExtRowStatus.name: hh3cMirrorExtRowStatus
hh3cMirrorExtRowStatus.description: This object identifies the action to create or delete the distribution for the mirror resource.
